showScoreExcerpt:
“The autistic actors, all making their Broadway debuts, perform with grace, charm, and skill, and it is wonderful to see the spotlight shining on them and on their characters. But it is unclear as to the intent of the show, which lacks much by way of character development, dramatic tension, or insight...But even as we cheer them on and take delight in their triumphs, there is not enough here to make this a successful film-to-stage translation.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: There is not enough here to make this a successful film-to-stage translation.
